constructors.doc:
Creates a new and populates it with menu items and submenus according to 

model
.

The created menu items are connected to actions found in the to which the menu bar belongs - typically by means of being contained within the #GtkApplicationWindows widget hierarchy.
constructors.name: new_from_model

doc: The is a subclass of which contains one or more #GtkMenuItems. The result is a standard menu bar which can hold many menu items.

methods.doc: Retrieves the current child pack direction of the menubar. See .
methods.name: get_child_pack_direction

methods.doc: Retrieves the current pack direction of the menubar. See .
methods.name: get_pack_direction

methods.doc: Sets how widgets should be packed inside the children of a menubar.
methods.name: set_child_pack_direction

methods.doc: Sets how items should be packed inside a menubar.
methods.name: set_pack_direction

name: MenuBar

properties.doc: The child pack direction of the menubar. It determines how the widgets contained in child menuitems are arranged.
properties.name: child-pack-direction

properties.doc: The pack direction of the menubar. It determines how menuitems are arranged in the menubar.
properties.name: pack-direction
